cells.content: Note: Borders the Malaysian state of Sarawak on the island of Borneo.

Note: The border around the area of Hans Island between Canada and Greenland (a Danish dependent territory) is disputed and undefined. Canada also shares a maritime border with Saint Pierre and Miquelon, a French dependent territory

Note: Denmark is connected to Sweden via the ?resund Bridge. The border around the area of Hans Island between Canada and Greenland (a Danish dependent territory) is disputed and undefined. See dependent territories below.
Note: On the island of Hispaniola.
Note: On the island of Hispaniola.
Note: The Republic of Ireland borders the United Kingdom on the island of Ireland.
Note: Lesotho is an enclave entirely surrounded by South Africa.
Note: Monaco is surrounded on three sides by France, the last bordering the Mediterranean.
Note: On the island of New Guinea.
Note: The planned Qatar?Bahrain Friendship Bridge would connect Qatar to Bahrain.
Note: San Marino is an enclave entirely surrounded by Italy.
Note: On the Korean Peninsula, at the Demarcation Line. The two countries are separated by a 4 km wide Demilitarized Zone.
Note: On the island of Timor.
Note: The Vatican is an enclave entirely surrounded by Italy.

Note: The United Kingdom borders the Republic of Ireland on the island of Ireland. The UK is also connected to France via the Channel Tunnel. The UK sovereign base areas Akrotiri and Dhekelia share borders with Cyprus. Gibraltar, a UK overseas territory, shares a border with Spain. See dependent territories below.
